title: Calm before the storm! Rihanna goes make-up free and covers up in comfy tracksuit as she jets to LA ahead of the … – Daily Mail
text: Buy now Making a scene: Last week, the star put on a dazzling display as she headed to a late night photoshoot However, she returned to her musical roots last week as she headed to a video shoot in New York City . For her first outfit she wore a black, white and grey camo from head to toe, with the fashion icon making the typically masculine print look feminine. Her loose-fitting pants featured grey drawstrings at the ankle, left to dangle next to her shiny shoes. The Diamonds singer wore jewel-encrusted, pointed-toe high heels with an ankle strap as she glided through the crosswalk. Rihanna wore an over-sized grey hooded sweatshirt under her reversible coat, with green and brown camouflage peaking out around her neckline as she carried a small, black handbag. However, the Needed Me singer decided to go even bolder for her second outfit. In the zone: The 28-year-old looked focus as she stepped out of a private car and crossed the street with her down Making it look good: Wearing black, white and grey camo from head to toe, the fashion icon made the typically masculine print look feminine with key accents She decided to change into a giant red coat with black rainproof material placed on her head along with the same crystal sparkly stilettos. The Love On The Brain singer added large, geometric diamond earrings to her look, which accented her blinged-out choice of rings. The singer was probably trying to guard herself from the rain as she bundled up warm in the over sized coat and head gear. Sexy chic: Rihanna wore an over-sized grey hooded sweatshirt under her coat, with green and brown camouflage peaking out around her neckline as she carried a small, black handbag The 28-year-old Grammy winner looked focus as she stepped out of a private car and crossed the street. The performer was on her way to shoot a music video, possible for one of the songs off her latest album, Anti, which was released on January 28, 2016. Anti is Rihanna's eighth studio album, following up 2012's Unapologetic. Always working: The performer was on her way to shoot a music video, possible for one of the songs off her latest album, Anti, which was released on January 28, 2016 What's under there? Once she got situated on set, the singer and songwriter emerged in a different jacket, this time full-length to hide whatever was going on underneath Opting for her usual smokey eye, the star's glam team amped up the look even more with dewy, highlighted cheeks and a nude lip for the shoot. In addition to her musical endeavors, the Barbadian will soon appear in the female-led fourth installment of the Ocean's casino heist series. The anthology was made modern-day famous by George Clooney and Brad Pitt's Ocean's Eleven, which was a remake of the rat pack's 1960 original version by the same name. Bright like a diamond! The Love On The Brain singer kept the sparkling shoes and added large, geometric diamond earrings to her look, which accented her blinged-out choice of rings Other projects: In addition to her musical endeavors, the Barbadian will soon appear in the female-led fourth installment of the Ocean's casino heist series Full on: Opting for her usual smokey eye, the star's glam team amped up the look even more with dewy, highlighted cheeks and a nude lip for the shoot Rihanna will appear in Ocean's Eight alongside several of the greats for her role in the film, with this edition's all-girls team of thieves led by Sandra Bullock and Cate Blanchett. Other members of the cast include rapper and actor Awkwafina, Helena Bonham Carter, Anne Hathaway, Mindy Kaling, Sarah Paulson and Adriana Lima. The Bates Motel guest star shared an image from a New York City subway to her Instagram account on January 30, revealing a first look at the ensemble cast in action. Ocean's Eight is set to premiere in June 2018 at this time, according to IMDB.
